original_text:
Therefore this is what the Lord says:
“Inquire among the nations:
    Who has ever heard anything like this?
A most horrible thing has been done
    by Virgin Israel.
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 너희는 누가 이러한 일을 들었는지 여러 나라 가운데 물어보라 처녀 이스라엘이 심히 가증한 일을 행하였도다

sentences.original_text: Therefore this is what the Lord says:
Who has ever heard anything like this?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 이런 것을 들어본 적이 있는가?

sentences.original_text: A most horrible thing has been done
